point1: With over 2 years of industry experience, Yuanming (Oliver) Wu has built a strong portfolio as a Full Stack Engineer, showcasing expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and GraphQL.
point2: Notably, Oliver spearheaded the redevelopment of www.tidyteddy.com.au, resulting in 20% faster load times and a 25% increase in quote request submissions.
point3: As a skilled Full Stack Engineer, Oliver boasts proficiency in React.js, TypeScript, Express.js, Redux, MySQL, Node.js, Docker, Git, Jira, and cPanel, with a strong focus on modern web development technologies.
point4: With a deep understanding of the tech industry, Oliver has gained experience in cloud platforms, including AWS, GCP, and Azure, and has obtained the AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner certification.
point5: What sets Oliver apart is his unique ability to combine technical expertise with a strong focus on design consistency and user experience, as evident in his work on the UI guideline system for QuickSite.guru, which improved developer efficiency by 25%.
